title: Relatives of Rohingya men killed in Myanmar recount horror
text:
Relatives of Rohingya men killed in Myanmar recount horror 2:43pm BST - 02:09 
Ten Rohingya men were massacred in Myanmar. Their families spent months agonizing over their fate. The families of the 10, who fled to Bangladesh, tell their stories. Andrew Marshall reports from the Kutupalong refugee camp in Bangladesh.   
Ten Rohingya men were massacred in Myanmar. Their families spent months agonizing over their fate. The families of the 10, who fled to Bangladesh, tell their stories. Andrew Marshall reports from the Kutupalong refugee camp in Bangladesh.  //reut.rs/2qpujmV
